LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Militarum_Corporal.title: imperial guard corporal
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Militarum_Corporal.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was promoted to the rank of Corporal of tbeir squad. [PAWN_pronoun] was tasked with being a secondary their squad, and is the next in line to lead the squad during combat.
